EV isolated method: The EV isolation from patients’ plasma, urine, or cow milk and conditioned cell culture media were performed by incubation of 100 μL antibody-beads complex with 1 mL of samples at 4 °C overnight. After washing, the photorelease was performed using Analytikjena UVP 2UV Transilluminator Plus at 365 nm wavelength at 4 °C for 15 min (~6 mW/cm2).
